answerText: NMR spectroscopy [or nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy][10] The resonant frequency of a particular nucleus relative to a reference standard in NMR spectroscopy is known by this two-word term.
heading: MUT |2015 | 2 | 3 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Variants of this technique are based on protons and carbon-13. [10] Name this spectroscopic technique based on the magnetic properties of atomic nuclei.
